Room.Name: South Hafnia Circle/Rue Caledonia Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: This is the southeast side of the City Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: Rue Caledonia is the street directly north, connecting to Hafnia Boulevard. You seem to notice a lot of activity in this area of town. On the west side of the street, farther north, you see a caravan assembly lot. Toward the south you detect an unpleasant odor, and notice a road sign directing you to the city's dump.
